thread.title: FBI’s Cohen Raid: Legal Experts Weigh In

author: WSJ Staff
title: FBI’s Cohen Raid: Legal Experts Weigh In
text:
The FBI raid of President Donald Trump’s longtime lawyer Michael Cohen’s office and hotel room Monday was highly unusual. Prosecutors looking for information in an investigation typically send subpoenas asking for information, rather than perform an unannounced search. The raid also raised questions about the attorney-client privilege; federal agents typically need special permission to search the files of a lawyer. Mr. Trump on Tuesday tweeted that “attorney-client privilege is dead” and called the search “A TOTAL WITCH HUNT!!!” 

Several...
